Articles.Content: @rpayne88: I very much appreciate the offer, and may have to take you up on it. But now is not said time. Try asking again when more weather options are available from my mod. <3

@rpayne88: I very much appreciate the offer, and may have to take you up on it. But now is not said time. Try asking again when more weather options are available from my mod. <3

You're welcome.
Guess what?:
Can you use this with NEAR?
@Mekan1K No, It uses FAR as a dependancy, you MUST install FAR as said in the OP.
I'd love to see some solar wind/ solar sails make their way into this, assuming wind can work in a vacuum.

@ymir9 Solar wind isn't wind per se, but it's the electro-magnetic radiation emitted from the sun during either coronal mass ejections, or whatever else the sun has in it's kit to spew out radiation. TLDR; Solar wind is sun magics, and it may make it's way in eventually. Current development has almost grinded to a halt because of my brain refusing to learn the ways of texturing and mapping that to overlays...
Sorry to near that... Hope you can get development going again soon!

Hrm, if there are any part makers who are passing by on this thread, it would be lovely to have your assistance for making sails and other parts. If any of you have experience making parts, please PM me

Update: I'm getting real close to having a cloud overlay being put into the game guys, just need to find out what's causing my overlay to not appear, and then I'll have some moving clouds to you all reals soon!
Since you're using EVE's plugin and textures, how will this differ from it? Are the clouds affected by wind already or will it be basically 2-in-1?

@AndreyATGB, Im sorry to say but it'd be redundant to have EVE installed as well as KWS. You'd have conflicts of overlay data. Also, I wouldn't have clouds that don't move by wind. I'd probably have them not moving with wind, just for the time being, but i will work my hardest to make sure they can move one way or another!
No worries, if anything I'd like to see some progress with EVE (or any derivative work) since rbray seems rather busy for the time being.
@AndreyATGB, Trust me, he is hard at work and is applying work to EVE as well, a large overahul is on it's way for EVE.

@AndreyATGB, Trust me, he is hard at work and is applying work to EVE as well, a large overahul is on it's way for EVE.

Glad to hear that I cant play ksp wo his plugin
Update! I'm quite sure you're all pleased to see this~ :
oh, fancyy! How are your clouds in comparisons to robrays?

@ahappydude, One could say they're one in the same

Well you can tell everyone that you've already fixed the bugs that I discovered.

Update! Interesting things are happening... My Easterly wind seems to be backwards once again, I will pump out a patch for this ASAP, as well with the patch will include the 2d cloud overlay.

EDIT: PATCH IS OUT, PLEASE UPGRADE TO LATEST VERSION.
